  • Uses of Actor in game.actions

    Methods in game.actions with parameters of type Actor
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    AttackAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    When executed, the chance to hit of the weapon that the Actor used is computed to determine whether the actor will hit the target.
    String
    AttackAllAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    When executed, all surrounding actors are attacked and the chance to hit of the weapon that the Actor used is computed to determine whether the actor will hit the target.
    String
    ConsumeAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    When executed the Actor is allowed to consume the consumable item
    String
    DeathAction.execute​(Actor target, GameMap map)
    When the target is killed, the items & weapons carried by target will be dropped to the location in the game map where the target was
    String
    DespawnAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Despawns the actor (remove from the map) if the probability generated is less or same as the despawnProb
    String
    PickUpRuneAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    When executed the Rune is directly added to the Rune inventory of the Actor that could buy or sell using Runes
    String
    QuickStepAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    This method executes the unique skill to the GreatKnife, it deals the normal damage from the weapon to the enemy.
    String
    ResetAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Resets the entire game by resetting all the actors and other game elements that need to be reset during a game reset
    String
    RestAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Allows the actor to rest at site of lost grace and resets the entire game
    String
    ReviveAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Revives toRevive and removes the Actor performing teh action from the game
    String
    SpawnAction.execute​(Actor spawner, GameMap map)
    Spawns the Enemy represented by toSpawn and removes spawner from the game
    String
    UnseatheAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    This method executes the unique skill to the Uchigatana, it deals 2x damage from weapon with a 60% hit rate.
    String
    AttackAction.menuDescription​(Actor actor)
    Describes which target the actor is attacking with which weapon
    String

  • Uses of Actor in game.actors.enemies

    Subclasses of Actor in game.actors.enemies
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Enemy
    An abstract that represents enemies in the game
    class 
    GiantCrab
    Giant Crab enemy, hostile creature, represented by C (uppercase C), that has 407 hit points and slams other creatures, including the player, dealing 208 damage with 90% attack accuracy
    class 
    GiantCrayfish
    Giant Crayfish, hostile creature, represented by R (uppercase R), that has 4803 hit points and slams other creatures (single target attack), including the player, with their giant pincer, dealing 527 damage with 100% accuracy
    class 
    GiantDog
    Giant Dog, inhabitant of the Lands Between, represented by G (uppercase G), that has 693 hit points and slams other creatures (single target attack), including the player, with their head, dealing 314 damage with 90% accuracy.
    class 
    HeavySkeletalSwordsman
    Heavy Skeletal Swordsman enemy, hostile creature, represented by q (lowercase Q), that has 153 hit points and carries around a weapon called Grossmesser
    class 
    LoneWolf
    BEHOLD, DOG! Lone Wolf enemy Created by:
    class 
    PileOfBones
    Pile Of Bones Heavy Skeletal Swordsman & Skeletal Bandit can turn to Pile Of Bones if killed Heavy Skeletal Swordsman & Skeletal Bandit is respawned if Pile Of Bones not hit in 3 turns AppliedSession03Group03
    class 
    SkeletalBandit
    Skeletal Bandit, hostile creature, represented by b (lowercase B), that has 184 hit points and carries around a weapon called Scimitar.
